text: ane ame sulaimana mate havane vasamam kari didhi, ke savarano samayagalo tena mate eka mahina barabara hato, tevi ja rite sanjano samaya pana ane ame temana mate tambanum jharanum vahavi didhum ane temana palanaharana adesathi ketalaka jinnata temana vasamam rahi temani same kama karata hata. Ane temana manthi je pana amara adesani avaganana kare, ame tene bhadakeli agano svada cakhadisum
